name: create-nuxt-base
description: Starter to generate a configured environment with VueJS, Nuxt, Tailwind, Eslint, Unit Tests, Playwright etc.
author: lenne.Tech GmbH

scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags origin main
